Maggotkin 3.0 (Age of Sigmar) [1,990pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Chaos - Nurgle) [1,990pts]

    • Core Battalion

      • Core Battalion: Grand Battery

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Slayers, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Grand Battery


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Slayers Once per battle, 1 unit from this battalion can receive the All-out Attack or Unleash Hell command without the command being issued and without a command point being spent.
        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Core Battalion: Grand Battery 1 Sub-commander
        2-3 Artillery

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Expert Underdogs, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Hunters of the Heartlands


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Expert Underdogs Units from this battalion cannot be picked when your opponent carries out a monstrous rampage.
        Battalion Organisation Required Ref

    • Leader [275pts]

      • Festus The Leechlord [140pts]

        Selections: 3. Gift of Contagion, General

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, NURGLE, ROTBRINGER, HERO, FESTUS THE LEECHLORD, WIZARD, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, General, Unique General

        Gift of Contagion: 1-2 Flyblown Palsy, 3-4 Muscular Atrophy, 5-6 Liquefying Ague, Magic: Festus The Leechlord, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Curse of the Leper, Gift of Contagion, Mystic Shield, Unit: Festus The Leechlord, Unit Abilities: Delightful Brews, Splendid Restoratives, Healing Elixirs, Weapon: Plague Staff


        Gift of Contagion Result Ref
        1-2 Flyblown Palsy Subtract 1 from the unit’s hit rolls in the combat phase.
        3-4 Muscular Atrophy Subtract 1 from the unit’s wound rolls in the combat phase.
        5-6 Liquefying Ague Subtract 1 from the unit’s save rolls.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Festus The Leechlord 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Curse of the Leper.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Curse of the Leper 7If successfully cast, select a unit within 14" of the caster that is visible to them. Subtract 1 from save rolls for that unit for the rest of the battle. This spell cannot be cast on the same enemy unit more than once during a battle.
        Gift of Contagion 6If successfully cast, select an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Then roll a dice and look up the result on the Gift of Contagion table. Apply the penalty to all models in the unit until the start of your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Festus The Leechlord 4"675+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Delightful Brews, Splendid Restoratives At the start of your hero phase, you can pick a unit (friend or foe) within 1" of Festus the Leechlord. If you pick a friendly unit, roll a dice. On a 2+ heal D3 wounds that have been allocated to that unit. If you pick an enemy unit, roll a dice. On a 2+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Healing Elixirs At the start of your hero phase, you can heal 1 wound that has been allocated to Festus the Leechlord.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Plague Staff Melee1"24+3+-D3

      • Poxbringer, Herald of Nurgle [135pts]

        Selections: 2. Glorious Afflictions, Arcane Bolt, Grand Battery - 1 Sub-commander, Mystic Shield

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, NURGLE, HERO, HERALD OF NURGLE, PLAGUEBEARER, WIZARD, Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader

        Magic: Poxbringer, Herald of Nurgle, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Eruptive Infestation, Glorious Afflictions, Mystic Shield, Unit: Poxbringer, Herald of Nurgle, Unit Abilities: Disgustingly Resilient, In Death There is Life, Weapon: Balesword


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Poxbringer, Herald of Nurgle 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Eruptive Infestation
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Eruptive Infestation 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit that is within 7" of a friendly Plaguebearers unit and visible to the caster. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Glorious Afflictions 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 21" of the caster that is visible to them. The unit’s Move characteristic and any run or charge rolls made for them are halved (rounding up) until your next hero phase. In addition, units that can normally fly cannot do so until your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Poxbringer, Herald of Nurgle 4"5104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Disgustingly Resilient Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 5+ the wound is negated.
        In Death There is Life At the start of your hero phase, if any models (friend or foe) were slain in the last turn, you can heal 1 wound allocated to a friendly NURGLE DAEMON unit within 7" of this model.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Balesword Melee1"33+3+-1D3

    • Battleline [770pts]

      • Plaguebearers [330pts]

        Selections: 30 Plaguebearers [110pts], Hunters of the Heartlands - 2-3 Troops, Icon Bearer, Piper, 2x Reinforced [220pts]

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, NURGLE, PLAGUEBEARER, Battleline, Reinforced

        Unit: Plaguebearers, Unit Abilities: Cloud of Flies, Disgustingly Resilient, Icon Bearer, Locus of Fecundity, Piper, Plagueridden, Weapon: Plaguesword


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Plaguebearers 4"1105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Cloud of Flies Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit while it has at least 10 models.
        Disgustingly Resilient Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 5+ the wound is negated.
        Icon Bearer Models in this unit can be Icon Bearers. If the unmodified roll is a 1 when making a battleshock test for a unit that includes any Icon Bearers, no models from the unit flee. Instead, D6 Plaguebearer models are added to the unit.
        Locus of Fecundity Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit while it is within 7" of a friendly NURGLE DAEMON HERO.
        Piper Models in this unit can be Pipers. Re-roll battleshock rolls of 1 for enemy units while they are within 6" of any Pipers.
        Plagueridden The leader of this unit is a Plagueridden. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Plagueridden’s Plaguesword.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Plaguesword Melee1"14+3+-1

      • Putrid Blightkings [330pts]

        Selections: 10 Putrid Blightkings [165pts], Hunters of the Heartlands - 2-3 Troops, Icon Bearer, Reinforced [165pts], Sonorous Tocsin

        Categories: CHAOS, NURGLE, MORTAL, PUTRID BLIGHTKINGS, ROTBRINGER, Battleline, Reinforced

        Unit: Putrid Blightkings, Unit Abilities: Blighted Weapon, Blightlord, Elite, Icon Bearer, Sonorous Tocsin, Virulent Discharge, Weapon: Blighted Weapon


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Putrid Blightkings 4"484+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Blighted Weapon If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this unit’s Blighted Weapons is 6, that attack scores D6 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Blightlord The leader of this unit is a Blightlord. A Blightlord has a Wounds characteristic of 5.
        Elite Models in this unit can issue commands to their own unit.
        Icon Bearer Models in this unit may be Icon Bearers. Add 1 to this unit’s Bravery characteristic while it includes any Icon Bearers.
        Sonorous Tocsin Models in this unit may carry a Sonorous Tocsin. Add 1 to this unit’s run and charge rolls whilst it includes any models carrying a Sonorous Tocsin.
        Virulent Discharge In your hero phase, roll a dice for each unit (friend or foe) within 3" of any friendly units with this ability. On a 6+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If the unit has the NURGLE keyword, heal D3 wounds allocated to it instead.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Blighted Weapon Melee1"33+3+1

    • Other [465pts]

      • Beasts of Nurgle [125pts]

        Selections: Beast of Nurgle [125pts]

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, NURGLE, Other, BEASTS OF NURGLE

        Unit: Beasts of Nurgle, Unit Abilities: Acidic Slime Trail, Attention Seekers, Disgustingly Resilient, Pestilent Battering Ram, Weapon: Clawed Limbs and Fanged Maw, Tentacles and Slobbering Tongue


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Beasts of Nurgle 5"8105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Acidic Slime Trail Before this unit makes a retreat move, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this unit. On a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Attention Seekers This unit can run and/or retreat and still charge later in the same turn. In addition, when this unit retreats, it can pass across other models in the same manner as a model that can fly.
        Disgustingly Resilient Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 5+ the wound is negated.
        Pestilent Battering Ram After a model from this unit finishes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of that model. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If this unit has more than 1 model, roll to determine if mortal wounds are inflicted after each model finishes its charge move, but do not allocate the mortal wounds until all of the models in the unit have finished their charge moves.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Clawed Limbs and Fanged Maw Melee1"44+3+-12
        Tentacles and Slobbering Tongue Melee1"D64+3+-1

      • Nurglings [90pts]

        Selections: 3 Nurglings [90pts]

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, NURGLE, Other

        Unit: Nurglings, Unit Abilities: Disease-ridden Demise, Endless Swarm, Hidden Infestations, Weapon: Tiny Razor-sharp Teeth


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Nurglings 5"4106+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Disease-ridden Demise At the end of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit that was allocated any wounds caused by a unit of Nurglings in that combat phase. On a 2+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Endless Swarm At the end of the battleshock phase, heal any wounds that have been allocated to this unit.
        Hidden Infestations Instead of setting up this unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up as a hidden infestation of Nurglings. If you do so, at the end of your first movement phase, set up the unit anywhere on the battlefield so that it is in cover and more than 9" from any enemy models.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Tiny Razor-sharp Teeth Melee1"55+5+-1

      • Plagueclaw [160pts]

        Selections: Grand Battery - 2-3 Artillery, Plagueclaw Catapult, Rusty Knives

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Plagueclaw 3"645+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Barrage of Disease Plagueclaw Catapult can target enemy units that are not visible to the attacking model. In addition, add 1 to hit rolls and increase the Damage characteristic to 2D6 for attacks made with a Plagueclaw Catapult if the target has 10 or more models.
        Hideous Death Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of a unit targeted by any Plagueclaw Catapults until the end of the turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref

    • Scenery

      • Feculent Gnarlmaw

        Categories: FECULENT GNARLMAW, Scenery

        Unit Abilities: Entropic Chimes, Sickness Blossoms


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Entropic Chimes In the charge phase of their commanding player, NURGLE units that are within 7" of any Feculent Gnarlmaws can attempt a charge even if they ran in the same turn.
        Sickness Blossoms At the start of the hero phase, roll a dice for each unit within 3" of any Feculent Gnarlmaws. On a 4+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. This scenery rule has no effect on NURGLE units.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Allegiance: Nurgle

        Categories: Allegiance, Coalition: Beasts of Chaos, Coalition: Slaves to Darkness

        Battle Trait: Cycle of Corruption, Summon Daemons of Nurgle, Spell: Foul Regenesis


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Cycle of Corruption Roll a dice at the start of the first battle round of any battle that includes any NURGLE armies, before rolling to see who has the first turn. Refer to the table to see which stage of the Cycle of Corruption is currently taking place - this applies to all NURGLE armies. The Cycle of Corruption moves on one step at the start of each new battle round. For example, if the roll on the Cycle of Corruption table was a 5, then Nauseous Revulsion would apply in the first battle round, Rampant Disease in the second, Corrupted Regrowth in the third, and so on. The rule for the current stage applies for the duration of the battle round. Chaos Battletome: Maggotkin of Nurgle p59
        Summon Daemons of Nurgle You can summon units of NURGLE DAEMONS to the battlefield if you collect enough contagion points. At the start of each of your hero phases, you receive 3 contagion points if there are any friendly NURGLE models in your own territory, and 3 additional contagion points if there are any friendly NURGLE models in your opponent’s territory. If there are no enemy models in the same territory as friendly NURGLE models, you receive 1 extra contagion point for that territory. In addition, you receive D3 contagion points for each Feculent Gnarlmaw that has no enemy models within 3" of it. If you have 7 or more contagion points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one or more units from the following list to the battlefield, and add them to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of contagion points, as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough contagion points remaining to pay its cost. Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12" of a Feculent Gnarlmaw or a friendly NURGLE HERO, and more than 9" from any enemy models. If the summoned unit is a Feculent Gnarlmaw, it must also be set up more than 1" from any terrain features. Subtract the cost of the summoned unit from the number of contagion points you have available immediately after it has been set up.
        Spell Casting ValueDescriptionRange Ref
        Foul Regenesis 7Pick a result from the Stage of Corruption - the Cycle of Corruption is immediately reset to the stage you picked.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Hold the Line

        Categories: Game Options

        Grand Strategy: Hold the Line


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Hold the Line When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any Battleline units from your starting army on the battlefield.
